findings.title: Improve the detection rules
findings.description: There are three common functions to increase the amount of allowance, but currently only approve (address, uint256) is used.

findings.title: Wrong Prompt
findings.description: The prompt of convertToSimulationPanel is wrong when transferring ERC20 token or native coin, displaying a NFT-related message.

findings.title: [N2] wrong prompt
findings.description: The prompt of convertToSimulationPanel is wrong when transferring ERC20 token or native coin, displaying a NFT-related message.

findings.title: [N3] Improve the detection rules
findings.description: Improve the detection rules by including three common functions to increase the amount of allowance: approve(address,uint256), increaseAllowance(address,uint256) and increaseApproval(address,uint256)

findings.title: Data of target nft contract is wrong
findings.description: The address 0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180aa3 is a malicious function instead of the target NFT contract.
